entry.title: BodyWell‚Ñ¢ Acupressure Relief Mat
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 49.99 - 87.99 (12 variants)

Product Description:

Everyday hassle and stress make it seem normal for most people to feel pain their body ‚Äî muscle soreness, headaches, migraines, etc. But instead of getting used to it, thinking that pain may go away by taking a rest or by medication, there‚Äôs one thing perfect just for you ‚Äî BodyWell‚Ñ¢ Acupressure Relief Mat!

FINEST QUALITY MATERIAL: This mat is made of thick cotton and plant-based eco foam, whereas the acupressure points are made of toxic-free surgical plastic and have been ergonomically designed to guarantee comfort and relaxation.

INCREASED ENERGY & CIRCULATION: It has 6,210 acupressure points while the neck pillow has 1,782 acupressure points effective in promoting blood circulation, increasing energy, and speeding up muscle recovery.

PAIN REDUCTION: In addition to relieving stress and muscle tension, this mat helps stimulate the production of endorphins in the brain, which is known as natural pain killers.

IMPROVED BODY & HEALTH CONDITION: Lying your back on this mat with thousands of acupressure points for less than 20 minutes daily can help ease back pain, migraines, tension, sciatica, and even reduce insomnia.

FULL SUPPORT: Unlike the common mats, this acupressure mat provides full support for your back and also comes with a pillow covered with acupressure points.

    How to Use:

    Step 1: Lie down or sit on your bed or couch. For a more intense massage, use on the floor.
    Step 2: Remove clothing from your upper body or you can wear a thin t-shirt.
    Step 3: Slowly and gently lie down on your back until you are lying flat.
    Step 4: If you want to target your lower back, bend your knees or prop them up on a pillow.
    Step 5: Start with 15 minutes and work your way up to 30 minutes.

entry.title: SmartTherapy‚Ñ¢ Neck and Shoulder Electric Pulse Massager
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 99.99

Product Description:

About 40% to 50% of working adults suffered from neck pain every day. Often times, this issue is caused by injury, poor posture, sleep position, fall, and other related reasons. The pain ranges from moderate which can be relieved within a few days, while in some cases, it can lead to serious detrimental issues if left unnoticed. Regardless of the condition, why would you like to endure such pain? Break free from neck pain and cervical illnesses with the genius SmartTherapy‚Ñ¢ Neck and Shoulder Electric Pulse Massager!

3 DIFFERENT MASSAGE MODES: Unlike the typical conventional massager found in the market that provides prototypical vibration, this revolutionary massager has three (3) massage modes that create traditional acupuncture and deep-tissue Shiatsu.

COMBINES 2 TECHNOLOGIES: This revolutionary massager combines low-frequency electrical impulses with consistent heat and Transcutaneous Electrical Nerve Stimulation technology or TENS to soothe neck, relieve shoulder tiredness, heal inflammation and arthritis in the shoulder and upper back, alleviate dizziness, headaches, stiff neck, and ease muscle spasms and body tension.

RELAXING: As the name suggests, this tool provides a holistic massage identical to the relaxation you get with real-life massage!

BEST MASSAGE EXPERIENCE: This massage tool provides a deep-tissue penetration or pin-point pressure relief by accessing the depth of your trigger points, by then, the affected area of your pain experiences efficient blood flow while releasing endorphins or natural painkillers. It can also avoid irritability by improving sleep conditions.

FAST RELIEF: It can effectively ease cervical pain, body tension, headache, pinched nerve, arthritis, and even fatigue within 15 minutes!

COMFORTABLE & PORTABLE: This massager is fully equipped with an elastic arm and soft pressure band comfortable to fashionably wear when at home, in the office, or when going out.

    How to Use:

    Step 1: Wipe your neck with a wet wipe or towel.
    Step 2: Click the button on the side of the massager.
    Step 3: Choose which massage mode suits you best by adjusting the intensity on the remote control.

    *Recommended gear is between 7-10 intensity.

entry.title: FLAWLESSYOU‚Ñ¢ Stretch Mark Removal Sheet
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 21.99

Product Description:

A small mark in our body can affect our confidence, what more if it is a huge scar caused by pregnancy, c-section, and surgeries? These things yield unpleasant marks which can be permanent if left unsupervised! It looks UGLY and breaks self-esteem!

Good thing there's FLAWLESSYOU‚Ñ¢ Stretch Mark Removal Sheet!

This sheet contains composite material that can make any scar and lines gone!¬† The water vapor permeability of the patch reduces moisture which inhibits the activity of the capillaries causing hypertrophic scars.

Therefore, this patch does not only remove scars and softens the skin, but also eliminates the further formation of new scars!

Perfect for scars caused by surgery, pregnancy, burns, dermatitis, cosmetics, skin infections, frost, and dryness! See visible results in as fast as 7 days!

  • 100% SAFE and EFFECTIVE!
  • It is REUSABLE and WASHABLE
  • Repairs, moisturize and softens the skin
  • Prevents the formation of new scar
  • Comfortable and flexible

How To Use:

Step 1: Take out the patch from the package, and open the patch.
Step 2: Cut the patch according to the size of your scar. Add several patches if needed or for big scars.
Step 3: Clean the scar and your hands (please note that washing with alcohol is forbidden)
Step 4: Remove the film on the sheet
Step 5: Apply the patch to the scar and use tape or sticker to avoid it from dropping out

Specifications:

Material: Composite
Dimension: 12x3.5cm

Include:

1pc x Silicone Scar Removal Patch

Notes:

  • This patch can be used after wound healing usually after 20-30 days. Best to use before the rapid formation of scars!
  • Each strip should be worn 4-6 hours for the first 2 days, and extended to 24 hours a day.
  • Wash gel strip prior to usage
  • Each gel can last to 2-4 weeks
  • Total treatment time is 2-4 months
